TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextBoxRegex extends System.Object

Docs.summary: TextBoxRegex allows text validation using a regular expression.
Docs.remarks: If is set to Normal then IsValid will be set according to whether the regex is valid. If is set to Forced then IsValid will be set according to whether the regex is valid, when TextBox lose focus and in case the textbox is invalid clear its value. If is set to Dynamic then IsValid will be set according to whether the regex is valid. If the newest charachter is invalid, only invalid character of the Textbox will be deleted.
